DOC.brief_summary: Adult volunteer skin test 1.27 ug spherule-derived coccidioidin . The skin test antigen evaluate three different population adult volunteer determine safety efficacy product assessment delayed-type hypersensitivity Coccidioides immitis . Induration great equal 5 mm 48 hour consider positive exposure C. immitis .
DOC.criteria: Good Health ( absence active medical disease ) Meets criteria specific population group : Coccidioidomycosis Group : History coccidioidomycosis least 45 day duration confirm roentgenograph serologic mycologic finding Histoplasmosis Group : History pulmonary histoplasmosis Naive Control Group : Lifetime residence state WA , OR , ID , MT Never employ agricultural worker Serology negative C.immitis antibody Exclusion Criteria ( All Groups ) : Active medical disease Alcohol abuse illicit drug use Influenzalike illness within past 4 week Immunizations within past 4 week Current atopic contact dermatitis , psoriasis , erythema nodosum , urticaria Current treatment corticosteroid , cytotoxic immunosuppressive drug Immunodeficiency disease HIV infection Previous skin test coccidioidin SD Coccidioidin Pregnant lactate Adverse reaction thimerosal Adverse reaction Candida Trichophyton skin test antigen Coccidioidomycosis Group : Current cavitary disseminate coccidioidomycosis History histoplasmosis , blastomycosis Histoplasmosis Group : History coccidioidomycosis blastomycosis Naive Control Group : History coccidioidomycosis , histoplasmosis , blastomycosis Travel 30 day designate area CA , AZ , NV , UT , NM , TX Mexico , Central South America . Travel 7 day restrict area CA , AZ TX .
